product_name: Cordillera Sierra Crest Down Jacket - Women's - 2012 Special Buy
long_description: For cold days out and about in the elements, the Cordillera Sierra Crest down jacket keeps you snuggled up and toasty. Sturdy, windproof nylon shell fabric stands up to wear and tear. 700-fill-power down and feather insulation provides lightweight warmth that's highly compressible. Nylon lining slides easily over base layers. Hem and hood adjust with cordlocks to personalize the fit and lock in heat. Cordillera Sierra Crest down jacket features zippered, fleece-lined hand pockets. Special buy.
short_description: For cold days out and about in the elements, the Cordillera Sierra Crest down jacket keeps you snuggled up and toasty.
